summary: Thalmor Agent Yyon is a boss 100x times stronger than the Ebony Warrior. If you're up for the challenge, download the mod and head over to Riverwood to find him and his two henchmen. Install by taking out the ESP file and dropping it into your Skyrim data.
descriptionHtml:
Thalmor Agent Yyon is a boss 100x stronger than the Ebony Warrior. This is my 2nd boss mod, you can find my other one (Falkreath Boss Zavakin) here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69770

Thalmor Agent Yyon has been sent to Riverwood to investigate the rumors of a couple Nords who were trying to encourage belief in Talos. I won't tell you how strong he is, but you'll see as soon as you walk into Riverwood. Let's just say you're going to get paralyzed. A lot. Make sure to bring tons of healing potions with you.
author: Vigland
